preqs: LAW1100 or LAW1101 and LAW1102 OR LAW1104; LAW2100 or LAW2101 and LAW2102; LAW3300 or LAW3301 and LAW3302

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000567}
(Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {LAW1102, LAW1104} or  Must have passed 6 (I/W) units in {LAW1112, LAW1113, LAW1114, LAW2102, LAW2111, LAW2112})

description: This unit is designed to examine contemporary issues in the Asian legal systems. It will examine the Asian perspectives on the rule of law, the court reform, constitutionalism, security and human rights, legal pluralism, corruption and the issue of law and development. Students in this subject will gain a comparative overview of the legal systems of Indonesia, Malaysia and Singapore, with reference to other Asian countries as appropriate.
